title: Religious tolerance vital for prosperous societies : EU envoy
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 25 (APP):Ambassador of the European Union to Pakistan Androulla Kaminara Thursday said religious tolerance, understanding and respect was vital for prosperous societies.
While appreciating Pakistan’s initiative to provide a worship place of the Hindu community living in the federal capital, she said “freedom of religion is a fundamental right”.
Sharing her thoughts with APP, she said it was a goodwill gesture of Pakistan’s government for paying respect to other religions.
Kaminara congratulated the Hindu community for getting a temple, now they would not have to travel out of the city to perform religious rituals anymore.
